eventing_dcp_backlog.help: The total number of events not yet processed by eventing function

eventing_dcp_mutation_sent_to_worker.help: The total number of insert or update events sent to worker to be processed by OnUpdate function

eventing_dcp_mutation_suppressed_counter.help: The total number of suppressed inserts or updates events

eventing_dcp_deletion_sent_to_worker.help: The total number of delete events sent to worker to be processed by OnDelete function

eventing_dcp_expiry_sent_to_worker.help: The total number of expiry events sent to worker to be processed by OnDelete function

eventing_dcp_deletion_suppressed_counter.help: The total number of suppressed delete events

eventing_worker_spawn_counter.help: The total number of times worker process respawned

eventing_agg_queue_memory.help: The aggregate memory size of messages across all worker processes

eventing_agg_queue_size.help: The aggregate number of messages across all worker processes

eventing_on_update_success.help: The total number of successful OnUpdate calls

eventing_on_update_failure.help: The total number of failed OnUpdate calls

eventing_dcp_delete_msg_counter.help: The total number of delete events processed by worker

eventing_dcp_mutations_msg_counter.help: The total number of insert or update events processed by worker

eventing_on_delete_success.help: The total number of successful OnDelete calls

eventing_on_delete_failure.help: The total number of failed OnDelete calls

eventing_timer_cancel_counter.help: The total number of successful CancelTimer call

eventing_timer_create_counter.help: The total number of successful CreateTimer call

eventing_timer_create_failure.help: The total number of failed CreateTimer call

eventing_timer_callback_success.help: The total number of successful timer callback invocations

eventing_timer_callback_failure.help: The total number of failed timer callback invocations

eventing_timer_msg_counter.help: The total number of timer callbacks processed

eventing_bucket_op_exception_count.help: The total number of bucket op exception

eventing_timeout_count.help: The total number of javascript execution exceeding execution timeout

eventing_n1ql_op_exception_count.help: The total number of n1ql op exception

eventing_timer_context_size_exception_co.help: The total number of timer_create_failure due to payload exceeding timer_context_size

eventing_timer_callback_missing_counter.help: The total number of undefined timer callback function

eventing_bkt_ops_cas_mismatch_count.help: The total number of bucket op cas mismatch

eventing_checkpoint_failure_count.help: The total number of failed checkpoint writes

eventing_worker_restart_count.help: The total number of time worker is respawned due to worker process crash
